description: Self-identifier for this data file - HTAN ID of this file HTAN ID SOP (eg HTANx_yyy_zzz)
name: HTAN_Data_File_ID

description: HTAN Data File Identifier indicating the file(s) from which these files were derived
name: HTAN_Parent_Data_File_ID

description: Category of metadata (e.g. Diagnosis, Biospecimen, scRNA-seq Level 1, etc.)
name: Component

description: Inclusion in HTAN Data Release e.g. Release 1.0
name: Data_Release

description: CDS transfer package in which file was included e.g. v22.6.1.seq
name: CDS_Release

description: Name of HTAN Center e.g. HTAN HTAPP
name: HTAN_Center

description: HTAN ID of the biospecimen directly assayed using the experimental platform
name: HTAN_Assayed_Biospecimen_ID

description: HTAN ID of the biopsied or resected biospecimen from the patient from which the assay data were derived
name: HTAN_Originating_Biospecimen_ID

description: HTAN ID associated with a patient based on HTAN ID SOP (eg HTANx_yyy )
name: HTAN_Participant_ID

description: Full Biospecimen ancestry path from HTAN_Assayed_Biospecimen_ID to HTAN_Originating_Biospecimen_ID as comma separated list
name: Biospecimen_Path
